title: Restore session
content: Before I get to the heart of the matter I need to clarify something. My browser have updated to the new version two days ago. When I open it yesterday it did not restore my session, I checked resently closed windows but it was clean. I looked on the forums and found out that I can use old copies of the session to restore it, unfortunately the "previous.jsonlz4" had already been overwritten, but I found three upgrade.jsonlz4 which may be suitable for restoration, I saved it and others files in another folder. It is a list of files that I have saved: 1.previous.jsonlz4 2.recovery.baklz4 3.recovery.jsonlz4 4. upgrade.jsonlz4-2025.... 5. upgrade.jsonlz4-2025.... 6. upgrade.jsonlz4-2025.... Then the forum said that I need to select one of the appropriate files, rename it to sessionstore.jsonlz4 and replace the old one. The problem is that I can't find sessionstore.jsonlz4. It was said that it appears after closing the browser, but I couldn't find it. Now after this introduction I can move on to my questions. Is it possible that this file is now called differently and this method of recovery can still be implemented? And are there other ways to restore the session? I would be very grateful for help.
creator: 2002.alex.red.2002

title: Firefox Profile - Immer wieder ein neues Profil beim Start vom Firefox erforderlich
content:
Hallo zusammen, ich benötige dringend Unterstützung bezüglich des Standardprofils in Firefox. Bei einigen Mitarbeitern wird jeden Tag nach dem Neustart das Neuanlegen des Profils verlangt. Ich habe die alten Profile über about:profiles gelöscht und neue angelegt. Firefox habe ich auch deinstalliert und neu installiert, aber das brachte keine Lösung. Am nächsten Tag ist das Profil wieder defekt und es erscheint folgende Nachricht:

You've launched an older version of Firefox

Using an older version of Firefox can corrupt bookmarks and browsing history already saved to an existing Firefox profile. To protect your information, create a new profile for this installation of Firefox.

Exit Create New Profile

Wir benutzen die aktuellste Firefox-Version 113 und setzen keine Roaming-Profile ein. Es handelt sich um eine Domänenumgebung, in der mit GPOs gearbeitet wird, jedoch ohne spezifische Einstellungen für Firefox. Hat jemand mehr Erfahrung und weiß, woran es liegen könnte? Vielen Dank an alle!

title: Both FireFox and Thunderbird can't connect to server anymore
content:
Hello,

I'm facing a two-fold problem:

1. Firefox (138.0.4, 64-bits): when trying to open a website the URL is loaded in the FF-tab, but the screen stays empty

2. Thunderbird (128.10.0esr, 64-bits): downloading messages isn't possible anymore. When sending a message I get following error message (in Dutch):

Verzenden van het bericht is mislukt. Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van e-mail: fout met uitgaande (SMTP-)server. De server antwoordde: Cannot connect to SMTP server 127.0.0.1 (127.0.0.1:54601), connect error 10061.

Translated to English:

Sending the message failed. An error occurred while sending the email: Outgoing (SMTP) server error. The server responded: Cannot connect to SMTP server 127.0.0.1 (127.0.0.1:54601), connect error 10061.

I did a ping with following result:

C:\Users\<user>>ping 127.0.0.1

Pinging 127.0.0.1 with 32 bytes of data: Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=128 Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=128 Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=128 Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=128

Ping statistics for 127.0.0.1: 

   Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),

Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds: 

   Minimum = 0ms, Maximum = 0ms, Average = 0ms


I didn't make any changes to FF and/or TB, and my wild guess is that the necessary Mozilla servers aren't available anymore, due to:

May 21, 2025

No incidents reported today. May 20, 2025 Mozilla Monitor website will be down for 2 hours starting 5/20/2025 at 6 AM PT. Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. May 20, 15:02 UTC Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the maintenance items. May 20, 14:40 UTC In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. May 20, 14:00 UTC Scheduled - Mozilla Monitor website will be down for maintenance for 2 hours starting 5/20/2025 at 6 AM PT. During this time, the site will be unavailable.

If somebody could step-in, that would be great!

title: Vanwege problemen met mail doorgestuurd door hulpteam microsoft naar browser.
content: Vanwege problemen met outlook gisteren contact opgenomen met Microsoft. Deze hebben een check gedaan, iets vermeld over een "schaduw account" en me doorverwezen naar de browser. De problemen gaan over pas kunnen inloggen na meerdere pogingen, niet ingelogd kunnen blijven, goede bekende mail die ongevraagd in de spambox verdwijnt, niet reageren, vast blijven zitten etc, etc. Deze problemen ondervind ik ook bij Facebook. Ik heb een 2e hands plaatselijk gekocht Elitebook 8540p en meerdere probleempjes die mogelijk hiermee samenhangen, geen idee. Ik ben 65jr en redelijk slechtziend, ik red me meestal prima, ook via beeldend geheugen, maar leeswerk kost erg veel tijd en door 33 artikelen heen spitten redt ik gewoon niet, sorry. Ps, Microsoft had vanochtend onder het inlogvenster een extra venster waarin een aanwijzing voor een aangetroffen 2e account waarop ik mogelijk kon inloggen, dit lukte prima.  :) gelukkig. Hopend op hulp via deze manier, mvg Anita.

title: When connecting TB4 with U3225QE, only Firefox changes color
content: DELL's new monitor, U3225QE, can be connected via Thunderbolt 4. I can display 120Hz and Edge and Chrome display without any problems. Only in Firefox there are some areas that should be displayed in white but are displayed in pink. By the way, when connected via HDMI 2.1, the display is 120Hz without any discoloration. If you turn on the dynamic refresh rate, the screen will go black every time you move the mouse. When it is OFF, Firefox browsing does not change color and can be used normally, I called Dell support and they told me, "That's probably a problem with Firefox." It would be helpful if Mozilla could address this issue.

content:
Da un apio di mesi, ogni volta che apro Firefox, Bitdefender mi da questo avviso:

Connessione sospetta bloccata

Funzionalità: Prevenzione minacce online

firefox.exe ha tentato di stabilire una connessione basata su un certificato di sicurezza non corrispondente per sync.contextualadv.com. Abbiamo bloccato la connessione per mantenere al sicuro i tuoi dati in quanto il certificato usato è stato emesso per un altro indirizzo web rispetto a quello indicato

Come posso correggere?
